resources.string: Q1. How was this application made?
A1. This application was made through Android Studio. Main languages/tools/technologies used: Java, Kotlin, XML, SQLite, Picasso lib, Volley lib, & much more!
Q2. How hard is android development?

A2. Personally, I found it to be quite easy. The fact that I did Web Development before this actually made this a lot easier. I did not have any trouble in making this application and actually enjoyed the process.
Q3. Are we going to see any new applications from you moving forward?

A3. Probably not, as android development is not my main interest as of right now. But hey, never say never. I might develop a really cool application with an awesome UI later somewhere down the line, but as of right now, I have more important things to focus on.
Can\'t find any Restaurant with that name!
